name: No Control
content: 仅仅有带着口红的唇印
仍留有一些纯真的痕迹
Beside you I'm a loaded gun
在你身边，我就像一把上膛的手枪
I've got no control  no control
我已失去控制，失去控制
And I don't care it's obvious
我不在乎，这看起来很明显
I just can't get enough of you
I don't want to wash away
In the heat where you lay
我可以呆在这里一整天
And burn in it all day
Beside you I'm a loaded gun
在你身边，我就像一把上膛的手枪
I've got no control  no control
我已失去控制，失去控制
And I don't care it's obvious
我不在乎，这看起来很明显
I just can't get enough of you
她的香水味将我紧紧包围
Lying here I count the hours
Beside you I'm a loaded gun
在你身边，我就像一把上膛的手枪
I've got no control  no control
我已失去控制，失去控制
And I don't care it's obvious
我不在乎，这看起来很明显
I just can't get enough of you
And I don't care it's obvious
我不在乎，这看起来很明显
I just can't get enough of you
